typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		MANDT as short '000',
		SALESDOCUMENT as integer,
		SDDOCUMENTCATEGORY as string,
		SALESDOCUMENTTYPE as string,
		SALESDOCUMENTPROCESSINGTYPE as string,
		CREATIONDATE as date,
		CREATIONTIME as integer,
		LASTCHANGEDATE as integer,
		LASTCHANGEDATETIME as double,
		SALESORGANIZATION as short,
		DISTRIBUTIONCHANNEL as short,
		ORGANIZATIONDIVISION as short,
		SALESGROUP as short,
		SALESOFFICE as short,
		SOLDTOPARTY as string,
		CUSTOMERNAME as string,
		COUNTRY as string,
		CITYNAME as string,
		POSTALCODE as string,
		CUSTOMERACCOUNTGROUP as string,
		SALESDISTRICT as string,
		CUSTOMERGROUP as string,
		CREDITCONTROLAREA as string,
		PURCHASEORDERBYCUSTOMER as string,
		TOTALNETAMOUNT as double,
		TRANSACTIONCURRENCY as string,
		PRICINGDATE as date,
		BILLINGDOCUMENTDATE as date,
		BILLINGCOMPANYCODE as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SalesOrdersFromAzDL
